Entry.JapaneseText: 溶けない氷
Entry.EnglishText: The Unmelting Ice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>一年前の事故<White>で、幼なじみの<Red>クレア<White>を氷塊に閉じこめてしまった<Red><Veigue><White>。 <Veigue>の必死の努力もむなしく、クレアを覆った氷が溶ける事はなかった。 そんな<Veigue>の前に<Yellow>能力者の二人<White>、<Red><Mao><White>と<Red><Eugene><White>が現れた。 <Mao>の<Yellow>炎のフォルス<White>の力を借り、<Veigue>はクレアを救出した。
Entry.EnglishText: <Yellow>One year ago<White>, <Red><Veigue><White> trapped his childhood friend <Red>Claire<White> in a block of ice in an accident. Despite his desperate efforts, the ice encasing Claire never melted. <Yellow>A pair of Force users<White>, <Red><Mao><White> and <Red><Eugene><White>, then appeared before <Veigue>. With the help of <Mao>'s <Yellow>Force of Fire<White>, <Veigue> was able to save Claire from the ice.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>バイラス<White>との戦いの後、<Veigue>は<Mao>たちの話を聞くために<Yellow>クレアの家<White>に向かった。
Entry.EnglishText: After battling some <Yellow>Biruses<White>, <Veigue> headed to <Yellow>Claire's House<White> to listen to what <Mao> and his friend had to say.

Entry.JapaneseText: 落日、そして旅立ち
Entry.EnglishText: The Dusk and Departure

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>と<Eugene>は、<Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>に始まる<Yellow>異変と陰謀<White>の存在を<Veigue>に告げた。 異変の原因を探り、王国を救うために、仲間になるよう誘う二人だったが、<Veigue>は、その誘いを断る。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao> and <Eugene> explain to <Veigue> the <Yellow>strange incidents and conspiracies<White> that began with the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White>. The two invite him to investigate the cause of these anomolies and save the kingdom, but <Veigue> refuses.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、それから間もなく、<Yellow>国王直属の能力者部隊・<Blue>王の盾<White>が現れ、<Blue>四星<White>の<Red>サレ<White>と<Red>トーマ<White>によって、クレアはさらわれてしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: But shortly thereafter, the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>, a <Yellow>group of Force users who report directly to the king<White>, shows up. Claire is kidnapped by two of its members, <Red>Saleh<White> and <Red>Tohma<White> of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアを取り戻すため、<Veigue>は旅立つ。
Entry.EnglishText: In order to get Claire back, <Veigue> sets out on a journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: 漆黒トリオあらわる!!
Entry.EnglishText: The Dark Trio!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>を追い、<Yellow>ミナール<White>へ向かう<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and his party chase after the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> to <Yellow>Minal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 先を急ぐ三人の前に、自らを<Red>漆黒の翼<White>と名乗る<Yellow>おかしな三人組<Red>（ギンナル・ドルンブ・ユシア）<White>が立ちはだかった。 <Veigue>たちは、漆黒の翼を軽くひとひねりにし、先を急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: But barring the party's chase is an <Yellow>odd trio<White> <Red>(Ginnar, Yucia, and Drombe)<White> who call themselves the <Red>Dark Wings<White>. <Veigue> and the party give them a quick beatdown before hurrying on ahead.

Entry.JapaneseText: 暗殺者のメロディ
Entry.EnglishText: Assassin's Melody

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは再び<Yellow>ミナール<White>に向かって<Yellow>ケケット街道<White>を進む。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party continue through the <Yellow>Keketto Highroad<White> towards <Yellow>Minal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 三人は途中の小屋で休む事にした。
Entry.EnglishText: The three decide to rest at a hostel along the way.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこで突然、宿屋の主人におそわれる。
Entry.EnglishText: But suddenly, they are assaulted by the innkeeper.

Entry.JapaneseText: 小屋の人々は<Blue>王の盾・四星<White>の一人、<Red>ワルトゥ<White>の<Yellow>音のフォルス<White>で操られていた。 <Veigue>は、<Yellow>暗示を解くカギとなる音<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: The people in the hostel are being hypnotized by <Red>Walto<White>, user of the <Yellow>Force of Sound<White> and one of the <Blue>Four Stars<White> of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. <Veigue> searches for the <Yellow>sound that acts as the key to breaking the hypnotism<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々を救った三人に、敵が近づく。
Entry.EnglishText: As the three free the people, their enemy approaches them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちの前に現れたワルトゥは、国を案じ、<Eugene>の軍への復職を求めるが、<Eugene>は応じない。 ワルトゥは説得を諦め去って行く。 <Eugene>が起こした<Yellow>あの事件<White>という、<Yellow>謎の言葉<White>を残して……
Entry.EnglishText: Walto appears before <Veigue> and the party, Concerned for his country, he beseeches <Eugene> to rejoin the the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>, but <Eugene> refuses. Walto gives up on bringing him back and leaving behind some <Yellow>mysterious words<White> that seem to imply an <Yellow>incident<White> <Eugene> was involved in...

Entry.JapaneseText: エトレー橋の決戦!!
Entry.EnglishText: Battle on Etoray Bridge!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ミナール<White>へ向かう<Veigue>たちは、 <Yellow>ケケット街道<White>を<Red>南<White>へとひた走る。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head to <Yellow>Minal<White> by taking the <Yellow>Keketto Highroad<White> <Red>south<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>エトレー橋<White>を渡ろうとすると、笑い声と共に、漆黒トリオが現れる。 <Red>漆黒の牙<White>と名を変えた三人は、<Veigue>たちを足止めしようと、<Yellow>エトレー橋<White>を破壊してしまった！ 漆黒の牙を一蹴した<Veigue>たちだったが、橋は通行不可能となり、<Yellow>アルヴァン山脈<White>へと大きく迂回する事を余儀なくされてしまう……
Entry.EnglishText: As they try to cross the <Yellow>Etoray Bridge<White>, the Dark Trio appears wtih a roar of laughter. The three, who have renamed their group to the <Red>Dark Fangs<White>, destroy the bridge to stall <Veigue> and the party! <Veigue> and the party defeat Dark Fangs, but the bridge has now become unpassable. They are forced take a significant detour through the <Yellow>Alvan Mountains<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: アルヴァン山脈を越えろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Crossing the Alvan Mountains!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>アルヴァン山脈<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party traverse through the <Yellow>Alvan Mountains<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこで三人を待っていたのは、<Yellow>荒れ放題の山道<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: In these mountains, what awaits the three are <Yellow>rugged mountain paths<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、フォルスを使い、険しい道を進んで行く。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party use their Force to advance through this rugged road.

Entry.JapaneseText: 様々な困難を乗り越え、旅を続ける間に<Veigue>は徐々に、<Eugene>と<Mao>に心を開き始めていた……
Entry.EnglishText: As they overcome the various challenges in their journey, <Veigue> begins to open up to <Eugene> and <Mao>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 雨の復讐
Entry.EnglishText: The Rain's Revenge

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ミナール平野<White>を横切り、<Yellow>ミナール<White>へと向かう<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party cross the <Yellow>Minal Plains<White> to reach <Yellow>Minal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 突然の異常気象に見舞われた三人は 雪の中を進む。
Entry.EnglishText: They are suddenly hit with extreme weather and have to traverse through the rain and snow.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>天候の迷宮<White>に陥った三人は、それがフォルスによるものだと考え、敵を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: The three are trapped in a <Yellow>maze created by the weather<White>. Suspecting it to be caused by Force, they look for the enemy.

Entry.JapaneseText: 敵のフォルスを打ち破った三人の前に、 <Yellow>雨のフォルス<White>を持つ能力者、<Red><Annie>・バース<White>が現れた。 <Yellow>彼女の父<Red>ドクター・バース<White>は、<Eugene>の<Cyan>親友<White>でありながら、<Eugene>に<Cyan>殺された男<White>だった。 復讐に燃える<Annie>と戦い、倒す<Veigue>たちだが、<Eugene>は親友の娘を放ってはおけない。 傷つき衰弱した<Annie>を救うため医者を求め、三人は<Yellow>ミナール<White>へ急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: As the three destroy the trap created by the enemy's Force, <Red>Annie Barrs<White>, user of the <Yellow>Force of Rain<White>, reveals herself before them. <Yellow>Her father, <Red>Doctor Barrs<White>, was a <Cyan>close friend<White> of <Eugene>'s, but <Eugene> had <Cyan>murdered him<White>. Bent on revenge, Annie confronts them, but <Veigue> and the party triumph. Despite being attacked, <Eugene> cannot leave his friend's daughter alone. Seeking a doctor to save <Annie>, who was wounded and fading, the three rush to <Yellow>Minal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 港町ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Harbor Town Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>の命に別状がないと知った<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>首都バルカ<White>へ渡る船を求める。
Entry.EnglishText: Upon hearing news that Annie survived through the worst of her wounds, <Veigue> and the party seek a ship to cross to <Yellow>Balka: The Capital City<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、港は軍によって封鎖されていた。
Entry.EnglishText: However, the port was blockaded by the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: 三人は船を求めて奔走する。
Entry.EnglishText: The three scramble to find a boat that will take them.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、結局行き詰まり、協力者を探す事になった。
Entry.EnglishText: In the end, they hit an impasse and sought to look for a collaborator who could take them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>医師キュリア<White>から、クレアの伝言を聞かされた三人は、<Blue>王の盾<White>が陸路を進んでいると知る。 その時、目覚めた<Annie>の心ない言葉が<Red>ミーシャ<White>を傷つけてしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: When <Red>Doctor Curia<White> informs them of the the message Claire left behind, the three learn that the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> is actually making their way on land. At that moment, <Annie> wakes up, whose ill-hearted words hurt <Red>Misha<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>牙のフォルス<White>を暴走させてしまったミーシャを救う<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party save Misha, whose <Yellow>Force of Fang<White> has run amok.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>の言動に戸惑う<Annie>だったが、事件の真相を知るため、<Veigue>たちと行く事を決意する。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie> is perplexed by <Eugene>'s actions and words, but decides to join <Veigue> and the party to discover the truth behind the incident of her father's death.

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷いの森
Entry.EnglishText: Forest Labyrinth

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>を加え四人となった一行は、<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: With <Annie>'s inclusion, the party is now a group of four. They decide to head for <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>迷いの森<White>へと足を踏み入れる。 <Annie>のアドバイスのもと、<Veigue>たちは、フォルスを使って迷宮を進んで行く。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party enter the <Yellow>Forest Labyrinth<White>. Following <Annie>'s advice, <Veigue> and the party use their Force to make their way through the labyrinth.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無事に迷いの森を抜けた四人の前方に、<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>へと続く道があった。
Entry.EnglishText: For the four who traversed the forest successfully, there lies a path leading straight to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 怒りのジャングル
Entry.EnglishText: Rage of the Jungle

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>を追って<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>に来た<Veigue>たちは、街の空気に異変を察し、様子をうかがう事にした。
Entry.EnglishText: After pursuing the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>, <Veigue> and the party notice the strange atmosphere in the town and decide to scope out the situation.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>密林化した製鉄工場<White>に<Yellow>強いフォルス<White>を感じた四人は、状況を探る。
Entry.EnglishText: The four feel a <Yellow>powerful Force<White> coming from the <Red>Steelworks that was overrun by plant life<White> and investigate the situation.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに現れたサレたちは、ヒューマの娘<Red>セレーナ<White>をさらおうとしていた。 目前で姉を奪われた怒りと哀しみで、<Yellow>樹のフォルス<White>を暴走させてしまった セレーナの弟<Red><Tytree><White>を救うため、 <Veigue>たちは工場の中へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh and his men had showed up there and tried to kidnap a Huma girl - <Red>Selena<White>. Her brother, <Red><Tytree><White>, lost control of his Force from his anger and sorrow at having his sister taken away, so <Veigue> and the party head into the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスに満ちた工場の中、<Tytree>を探す四人。
Entry.EnglishText: The four search for <Tytree> in the factory that is overrun with Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちに暴走を鎮められ、正気に戻った<Tytree>は、姉を救うため、四人と共に行く事を決意する。
Entry.EnglishText: After <Veigue> and the party quell his outburst, <Tytree> comes to his sense and decides to join the party on their journey to save his sister.

Entry.JapaneseText: 熱い男が仲間になった。
Entry.EnglishText: A hot-blooded fellow had joined the team.

Entry.JapaneseText: 裏切りの食卓
Entry.EnglishText: The Treacherous Meal

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>サニイタウン<White>を目指し、<Yellow>トヨホウス河<White>を下る事にした<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party decide to take the <Yellow>Toyohose River<White> down to <Yellow>Sunnytown<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、河下りの舟は壊れていた。
Entry.EnglishText: However, the riverboat was broken.

Entry.JapaneseText: 五人は、舟の修理に使う<Yellow>木材を集め<White>つつ<Yellow>キノコ狩り<White>をする事になった。
Entry.EnglishText: The five of them decide to <Yellow>forage for some mushrooms<White> while <Yellow>collecting wood<White> for the boat repairs.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこへ<Red>謎の男<White>が現れ、<Tytree>に<Veigue>たちの毒殺と引き換えに、姉セレーナを返すと取引をもちかける。
Entry.EnglishText: During their collecting, a <Red>mysterious man<White> appears before <Tytree> and offers him a deal to return his sister Selena in exchange for poisoning <Veigue> and the others.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何事もなかったかのように食事が始まり、五人が<Tytree>自慢のキノコ料理を食べていた時、敵が現れた。
Entry.EnglishText: The meal began rather uneventfully, with the five enjoying <Tytree>'s signature mushroom dish, when suddenly the enemy showed up.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毒の症状に苦しみながらも敵を倒すが、<Tytree>に対する疑惑が残る。 結局、<Tytree>が料理に使ったのが、<Red>バクショウダケ<White>という<Red>毒キノコ<White>だと判明し、疑惑は晴れる。
Entry.EnglishText: Although the party was sufferring from the symptoms of poison, they were able to defeat the enemy, but are left suspicious about <Tytree>. As it turns out, <Tytree> had accidentally used used a <Red>poisonous mushroom<White> known as <Red>Funny Fungus<White> in his dish, and so their suspicions were cleared.

Entry.JapaneseText: 激流!! トヨホウス河
Entry.EnglishText: Down the Rapids of Tohoyose River!

Entry.JapaneseText: 修理が終わった河下り便の舟で、<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: Using the repaired riverboat, <Veigue> and the party head to <Yellow>Sunnytown<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 激流を乗り越え、無事<Yellow>トヨホウス河<White>を下りきった<Veigue>たちの前方に、<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>が見えて来た。
Entry.EnglishText: Overcoming the rapids and safely descending the <Yellow>Toyohose River<White>, <Veigue> and the party finally see the sights of <Yellow>Sunnytown<White> ahead of them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 哀しき雷鳴
Entry.EnglishText: Sorrowful Thunder
Entry.Notes: It's referring to Hilda's situation. May need to come up with a better way to phrase it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無事に<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>に到着した<Veigue>たちは港へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Having arrived safely at <Yellow>Sunnytown<White>, <Veigue> and the party head for the harbor.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、この港も軍が封鎖していた。 五人は街で<Blue>王の盾<White>の情報を集める。
Entry.EnglishText: Unfortunately, this port too was blockaded by the military. The five search for information on the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> in the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: 娘をさらわれたという母親の話から、<Blue>王の盾<White>の足取りをつかんだ五人は、 <Yellow>テルアラ街道<White>を西へ進む。
Entry.EnglishText: Hearing from a mother about how her daughter was kidnapped, the five are able to continue their pursuit of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. They proceed westward along the <Yellow>Tel'Alla Highroad<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、<Blue>王の盾<White>から逃げて来た娘、<Red><Hilda><White>と出会う。 <Hilda>を守るため、五人は追っ手を迎え撃つ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party find <Red><Hilda><White>, a girl who managed to escape from the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. In order to protect <Hilda>, the five confront her pursuers.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、<Hilda>は<Yellow>敵の刺客<White>だった。 トーマによって<Red>ハーフ<White>だと暴露され、怒りのあまり暴走した<Hilda>と戦い暴走を鎮める<Veigue>たち。 傷ついた<Hilda>の手当てをするため、五人は<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>へと戻る。
Entry.EnglishText: However, it turns out that <Hilda> was actually an assassin from the enemy. When Tohma reveals that <Hilda> is a <Red>Half<White>, she flies into a rage and goes berserk, forcing <Veigue> and the party to fight her to quell her outburst. The five then return to <Yellow>Sunnytown<White> to tend <Hilda>'s wounds.

Entry.JapaneseText: 光の追跡者
Entry.EnglishText: Pursuing Light

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>を宿屋で休ませ、今後の進路を検討する<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: After taking <Hilda> to the inn to rest, <Veigue> and the party deliberate on their next course of action.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに<Blue>四星<White>の一員で<Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>を持つ能力者、<Red>ミリッツァ<White>が現れる。 ミリッツァに狙われたヒューマの娘を救うべく、五人は戦いを挑む。
Entry.EnglishText: But out of the blue comes <Red>Militsa<White>, a member of the <Blue>Four Stars<White> and user of the <Yellow>Force of Rainbow<White>. The five fight her to save a Huma girl, who is being targeted.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>攻略のカギが<Yellow>光<White>だと考えた<Veigue>たちは、フォルスを使って光を遮り、ミリッツァと戦う。
Entry.EnglishText: Believing that <Yellow>Light<White> is the key to countering the <Yellow>Force of Rainbow<White>, <Veigue> and the party use their Force to block the light and battle Militsa.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに現れた<Hilda>と共に戦い、ミリッツァを倒す<Veigue>たち。 トーマへの復讐のため、<Hilda>は五人と共に行く事を決意する。
Entry.EnglishText: With <Hilda> fighting alongside them, <Veigue> and the party are able to defeat Militsa. Desiring to take revenge on Tohma, <Hilda> decides to join the five on their journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王アガーテ
Entry.EnglishText: Queen Agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァが狙っていたヒューマの娘を探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party search for the Huma girl that Militsa was after.

Entry.JapaneseText: その娘<Red>スージー<White>は、<Yellow>ベルサス<White>という街で<Blue>王の盾<White>にさらわれた後、<Yellow>カレギア城<White>に送られ、そこから逃げて来たと話す。 スージーの話から、さらわれた娘たちは丁重な扱いを受けていると判明するが、<Red>アガーテ女王<White>がヒューマの娘たちを集める理由はわからないままだった。
Entry.EnglishText: The girl, <Red>Susie<White>, informs the party that she had been kidnapped by the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> in the city of Belsas and sent to <Yellow>Callegea Castle<White>, where she had escaped from. Susie's story reveals that the kidnapped girls had been treated with respect, but the reason why <Red>Queen Agarte<White> had gathered so many Huma girls was still a mystery.

Entry.JapaneseText: その矢先、<Yellow>首都バルカ<White>でアガーテ女王のお披露目の儀の開催が発表される。 ヒューマの娘たちの誘拐と関連があると感じ、不安を覚えた<Veigue>たちは先を急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: At that moment, an announcement was made - there would be a ceremony to celebrate the coronation of Queen Agarte in the Capital City of <Yellow>Balka<White>. Sensing a connection to the various abductions of Huma girls, <Veigue> and the party hasten to the capital city.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一方、クレアは、<Veigue>を信じ、孤独な戦いを続けていた……
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhile, Claire puts her trust in <Veigue> and continues to fight her own battle...

Entry.JapaneseText: クロダダク砂漠を行け
Entry.EnglishText: Onward to Kurodadaku Desert

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>バビログラード<White>を目指し、<Yellow>クロダダク砂漠<White>を<Red>南<White>へ向かう<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head <Red>south<White> through the <Yellow>Kurodadaku Desert<White> to reach <Yellow>Babilograd<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>が古井戸に落ち、偶然、<Yellow>カレーズ（地下水路）<White>が見つかる。 <Veigue>たちは砂漠の酷暑を避け、<Yellow>カレーズ<White>を進む事にする。
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree> ends up falling into an old well and accidentally discovers an <Yellow>underground waterway<White> known as <Yellow>Karez<White>. <Veigue> and the party decide to take <Yellow>Karez<White> to avoid the extreme heat of the desert.

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷路のように入り組んだ地下水路には、行く手をはばむ岩石やバイラス、水流など、数々の困難が待ち受けていた。 <Veigue>たちは力を合わせて進む。
Entry.EnglishText: This labyrinth of an underground waterway is filled with boulders, Biruses, water currents, and other obstacles. By working together, <Veigue> and the party are able to advance through these obstacles.

Entry.JapaneseText: 無事に<Yellow>カレーズ<White>を抜け地上に出た時、<Annie>が高熱を出し、倒れる。 手当てをするため、一行は近くの村、<Yellow>アニカマル<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: The party is able to safely exit <Yellow>Karez<White> and reach the surface, but <Annie> develops a high fever and collapses. In order to treat her, the party heads to a nearby village known as <Yellow>Anikamal<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマルの冒険家
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal Adventurer

Entry.JapaneseText: 病に倒れた<Annie>のため、医者を探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party look for a doctor to treat <Annie> who has fallen ill.

Entry.JapaneseText: 村人はよそ者に冷たく、医者もいない。
Entry.EnglishText: Unfortunately, the villagers act coldly to any strangers and there are no doctors in this village.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな中、<Red>冒険家フランツ<White>と出会う。
Entry.EnglishText: In that time though, they encounter the <Red>Frantz<White>, an <Red>adventurer<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツは、<Annie>が<Yellow>死の伝染病デスガロ熱<White>に感染していると告げる。 <Annie>の命が危ない。
Entry.EnglishText: Frantz informs the party that <Annie> is infected with a <Yellow>lethal illness<White> known as <Yellow>Deathgaro Fever<White>. <Annie>'s life is in grave danger.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、その治療には<Yellow>幻のバイラス・<Red>リブガロの角<White>が必要だった。 <Veigue>たちは、リブガロ発見の望みを託し、近くの<Yellow>オアシス<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Unfortunately, the only cure requires the horns of the <Red>Mirage Birus<White>, the Livgaro. <Veigue> and the party head to the nearby <Yellow>oasis<White>, hoping to encounter the Livgaro.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>リブガロの角から作られた薬<White>によって、<Annie>は事なきを得た。 フランツとの別れを惜しみつつ、<Veigue>たちは、再び<Yellow>バビログラード<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie> is saved by the <Yellow>medicine made from the horns of the Livgaro<White>. Saying farewell to Frantz, <Veigue> and the party continue on to <Yellow>Babilograd<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 登山洞の攻防
Entry.EnglishText: Battle in the Climber's Cavern

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>バビログラード<White>のある<Yellow>南大陸<White>を目指す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head to the <Yellow>southern part of the continent<White> where <Yellow>Babilograd<White> is located.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>登山洞<White>から山の上の街へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: To reach the town, they need to take the <Yellow>Climber's Cavern<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: その途中、改名した<Red>漆黒の爪<White>が現れる。 <Annie>はケガをしたギンナルの手当てをする。 ギンナルは<Cyan>「借りは返す」<White>と言い残し去って行く。
Entry.EnglishText: On the way, they encounter the renamed <Red>Dark Claws<White>. Annie treats Ginnar's leg injury and Ginnar leaves, saying that he would <Cyan>return the favor<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに<Blue>王の盾<White>の能力者<Red>ドネル<White>が現れ、<Veigue>たちに襲いかかる。 <Yellow>土のフォルス<White>を打ち破り、ドネルを 倒した六人だったが、<Yellow>落石<White>が発生し、足止めされてしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: A bit later, <Red>Donel<White> of the Royal Shield appears and attacks <Veigue> and the party. The six are able to defeat Donel's <Yellow>Force of Earth<White>, but he drops some boulders, blocking the party's path.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>の<Yellow>鋼のフォルス<White>で岩石を破壊し足止めを突破した六人は<Yellow>バビログラード<White>へと急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: Using <Eugene>'s <Yellow>Force of Steel<White>, the party breaks the boulders and hurries onward to <Yellow>Babilograd<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 禁じられた街
Entry.EnglishText: The Forbidden City

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは<Blue>王の盾<White>の情報を求め、<Yellow>バビログラード<White>を回る。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party scout out <Yellow>Babilograd<White> in search of information on the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>が街の人々を使い、娘たちを港へ連れて行った事をつきとめる六人。 しかし、山頂と港をつなぐ<Yellow>蒸気リフト<White>の管理人はワルトゥの<Yellow>音のフォルス<White>で操られ、リフトは動かない。
Entry.EnglishText: They learn that the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> has used the townsfolk to take the girls to the harbor. However, the Lift Caretaker has been hypnotized by Walto's <Yellow>Force of Sound<White>, and they are unable to use the lift.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>暗示を解く言葉<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party look for the <Yellow>key words that can break the hypnotism<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥの二重トリックを破り、港に降りた六人は、<Blue>王の盾<White>を追う。
Entry.EnglishText: After breaking Walto's two-fold hypnotism, the six take the lift down to the harbor and pursue the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥとミリッツァを退け、娘たちを救い出す<Veigue>たち。 <Tytree>はセレーナと再会するが、クレアはすでに<Yellow>バルカ<White>へ連れて行かれた後だった……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party fight Walto and Militsa and rescue the girls. <Tytree> is reunited with his sister Selena, but Claire has already been taken to <Yellow>Balka<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: The Capital City: Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>首都バルカ<White>へ急ぐ<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party rush to the <Yellow>Capital City: Balka<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 不気味にそびえる<Yellow>カレギア城<White>の前で、<Veigue>はクレアを想う……
Entry.EnglishText: Standing in front of the imposing <Yellow>Callegea Castle<White>, <Veigue> thinks of Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: その頃、城内の女王の間ではクレアとアガーテが対面していた。 クレアとの接見を終えたアガーテは、<Cyan>「クレアがわたくしを救ってくれる」<White>と言う。
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhile, Claire and Agarte have a face-to-face meeting in the Queen's room in the castle. After their meeting, Agarte declares that <Cyan>Claire will be her "salvation"<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 城への潜入を計る<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party attempt to infiltrate the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>情報屋ヨッツア<White>から<Red>ジベール<White>を紹介される。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Red>informant Yotza<White> introduces the party to <Red>Gibert<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジベールは情報と交換に、<Red>ハック<White>の 安否を確かめるよう求める。 <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>メセチナ洞窟<White>へ。
Entry.EnglishText: In exchange for information to infiltrate the castle, Gibert requests the party to confirm the safety of <Red>Hack<White>, a subordinate of his. <Veigue> and the party head over to <Yellow>Mesechina Caverns<White> to check up on Hack.

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスに襲われていたハックを救う。
Entry.EnglishText: They are able to save Hack from an attack by a Birus.

Entry.JapaneseText: 約束を果たした<Veigue>たちに、ジベールは城への潜入方法を教える。
Entry.EnglishText: Having fulfilled their end of the bargain, Gibert informs <Veigue> and the party on how to infiltrate the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖なる王
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred King

Entry.JapaneseText: ジベールに教えられた<Yellow>地下道<White>から、城への潜入を試みる<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party sneak into the castle through the <Yellow>underground passage<White> that Gibert revealed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 王族の脱出用に作られたという通路には、侵入者を防ぐための様々な仕掛けが施されていた。
Entry.EnglishText: The passaage, said to have been built as an escape route for the royal family, is equipped with several devices to ward off intruders.

Entry.JapaneseText: 潜入に成功した六人は、クレアや他の娘たちを探す。
Entry.EnglishText: After successfully infiltrating the castle, the six search for Claire and the other girls.

Entry.JapaneseText: サレに見つかり、一触即発の場へ女王アガーテが現れる。 謁見を許された六人は、アガーテが、カレギア王国を救うために、<Red>聖なる王復活の儀式<White>を執り行おうとしているのだと聞かされる。 クレアを返すよう訴える<Veigue>の声は、アガーテの耳には届かない。 そして、女王の怒りを買った六人は、捕らえられてしまう……
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh discovers them, but Queen Agarte shows up just as they are about to fight. The six are granted an audience and Agarte informs them that she will perform a <Red>ritual to resurrect the Sacred King<White> in order to save the Kingdom of Callegea. <Veigue> appeals to return Claire, but his request falls on deaf ears. The six, having incurred the Queen's wrath, are struck down and captured.

Entry.JapaneseText: 漆黒の地下牢
Entry.EnglishText: The Dark Dungeon

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>能力者収容所<White>に囚われた<Veigue>たちの前に、<Red>漆黒の鍵<White>が現れる。 「登山洞での借りを返す」と告げ、 ギンナルは<Veigue>を助け出すと、 カギとメモを置いて去って行く。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Red>Dark Keys<White> appear before <Veigue> and the party, who are trapped in a <Yellow>prison built for Force users<White>. Ginnar, holding true to his word to return the favor, breaks <Veigue> out and leaves him with a key and a memo.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>は、ギンナルのメモを頼りに、牢に仕掛けられた<Yellow>フォルス無効化装置<White>を解除し、仲間たちを救い出す。 <Red>聖なる王復活の儀式<White>の開始まで、残された時間は少ない。 儀式を阻止し、クレアを救うため、<Veigue>たち六人は、<Yellow>カレギア城<White>へと急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: Using the instructions written on the memo, <Veigue> disables the <Yellow>Force suppression device<White> in the prison and rescues his friends. There is little time before the <Red>ritual to resurrect the Sacred King<White> begins. To stop the ritual and save Claire, <Veigue> and the party rush to <Yellow>Callegea Castle<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 理由
Entry.EnglishText: Motive

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>カレギア城<White>に戻った<Veigue>たちは、クレアを捜す。
Entry.EnglishText: Having returned to <Yellow>Callegea Castle<White>, <Veigue> and the party search for Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、クレアは儀式のため、すでに連れられて行った後だった。 六人は城の屋上にある<Yellow>祭儀場<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: However, Claire has already been taken away for the ritual. The six head to the <Yellow>ritual dias<White> on the roof of the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: その行く手に、サレとトーマが立ちはだかる。 <Veigue>たちはサレとトーマを倒し、<Yellow>祭儀場<White>へと急ぐ。 戦いに敗れたサレの憎しみの言葉が、城内にむなしく響く……
Entry.EnglishText: Blocking their path stands Saleh and Tohma. <Veigue> and the party defeat Saleh and Tohma, hurrying on to the <Yellow>ritual dias<White>. Saleh, having been bested in battle, screams his hatred to the party, his words echoing in vain through the castle.
Entry.Notes: Needs a better way to write the sentence where Saleh is shouting his hatred

Entry.JapaneseText: 満月
Entry.EnglishText: Full Moon

Entry.JapaneseText: 厳戒態勢の城内を駆け抜け、<Yellow>祭儀場<White>にたどり着く<Veigue>。 しかし、その目前で儀式は執り行われ、女王アガーテは<Yellow>月のフォルス<White>を使い、 <Yellow>聖なる王の力<White>を手に入れる。 だが、アガーテの身体に異変が起こり、美しきガジュマの女王は黒く猛々しい、<Red>聖獣王ゲオルギアス<White>へと変化を遂げる。 ゲオルギアスは<Cyan>ヒューマせん滅<White>を唱え、<Veigue>たちに襲いかかる。 激しい戦いの末、<Veigue>たちに倒された<Yellow>聖獣王<White>は大爆発を起こし、クレアとアガーテはその爆発に飲み込まれる。 <Veigue>は閃光と爆風の中、ついにクレアを救い出す。
Entry.EnglishText: Even with the castle's heightened security, <Veigue> reaches the <Yellow>ritual dais<White>. However, Queen Agarte is able to perform the ritual before their very eyes, using her <Yellow>Force of Moon<White> to obtain the Power of the <Yellow>Sacred King<White>. However, something strange happens to Agarte's body, and the beautiful Queen of the Gajuma transforms into <Red>Geyorkias, King of the Sacred Beasts<White>. Geyorkias declares the <Cyan>destruction of all Huma<White> and attacks <Veigue> and the party. After a fierce battle, <Veigue> and the party defeat the <Yellow>Sacred King<White>, whose defeat causes an explosion that envelops both Claire and Agarte. <Veigue> heads into the blast and is finally able to rescue Claire.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if I should use explosion or another way to phrase this

Entry.JapaneseText: 目覚め
Entry.EnglishText: Awakening

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>スールズ<White>に戻った<Veigue>とクレア。 儀式以来、眠り続けていたクレアが、ようやく目を覚ました。 だが喜びも束の間、村で騒ぎが起こる。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and Claire are back in <Yellow>Sulz<White>. Claire, who has been unconcious ever since the ritual, has finally awoken. However, their joy is short-lived as a commotion breaks out in the village.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>ポプラおばさん<White>の種族差別的な発言をきっかけに、争いを始める人々。 それを鎮めたのは<Annie>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: The villagers start fighting amongst themselves after <Red>Aunt Poplar<White> makes some discriminatory remarks. <Annie> appears and defuses the situation.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>の話によれば、今、<White>世界規模の異変<White>が起こっており、その異変は<Eugene>の身にも影響を及ぼしているという。 <Veigue>は<Eugene>を救うため旅立つ決意をする。
Entry.EnglishText: According to <Annie>, there is a world-wide phenomena that is affecting <Eugene> too. <Veigue> decides to journey once more to save <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 二人は<Tytree>の協力を得るべく、<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: The two of them head over to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White> to recruit <Tytree>'s help.

Entry.JapaneseText: 奇妙な再会
Entry.EnglishText: A Strange Reunion

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ケケット街道の小屋<White>で休みを取る<Veigue>と<Annie>。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and <Annie> take a break in the hostel on <Yellow>Keketto Highroad<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこへ、クレアがやって来る。 まだ本調子ではないクレアを心配する<Veigue>だったが、クレアの意思は固く、三人で<Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>へ向かう事になる。
Entry.EnglishText: At that point, Claire appears. <Veigue> is worried that Claire is still not in good shape to journey with them, but she is adamant, so the three head to <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White> together.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ペトナジャンカ<White>で<Tytree>と再会する<Veigue>たち。 <Tytree>はバルカ行きを快諾し、四人は<Eugene>たちの待つ<Yellow>バルカのメセチナ洞窟<White>へと急ぐ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party reunite with <Tytree> at <Yellow>Petnadjanka<White>. <Tytree> is quick to offer his help, and the four of them hurry to <Yellow>Mesechina Cavern<White> near <Yellow>Balka<White>, where <Eugene> and the others are waiting.

Entry.JapaneseText: 洞窟では、<Mao>が<Veigue>たちを待ちわびていた。
Entry.EnglishText: Inside the cavern, <Mao> waits for <Veigue> and the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: 震える牙
Entry.EnglishText: Quivering Fangs

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>メセチナ洞窟<White>で<Veigue>たちが見たのは、ヒューマへの憎悪にとらわれ怒り猛る<Eugene>の姿だった。 <Eugene>を救う<Yellow>秘薬<White>を求めて、<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>ラジルダ<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: In the <Yellow>Mesechina Cavern<White>, <Veigue> and the party see <Eugene> seized by hatred towards Huma. Seeking a <Yellow>medicine<White> that could save <Eugene>, <Veigue> and the party head to <Yellow>Razilda<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 秘薬を探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party search for the medicine.

Entry.JapaneseText: その途中、<Hilda>と再会する。
Entry.EnglishText: Along the way, they encounter <Hilda> again.

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前、<Yellow>収容所<White>で助けた<Red>イゴル<White>の計らいで<Yellow>鎮魂錠<White>を手に入れた四人は、急いで<Yellow>メセチナ洞窟<White>へ戻る。
Entry.EnglishText: After obtaining the <Yellow>Requiem Pastille<White> with the help of <Red>Igor<White>, whom they had saved back in the <Yellow>prison<White>, the four rush back to <Yellow>Mesechina Cavern<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、ヒューマへの憎悪に支配され暴走を始めた<Eugene>は、<Veigue>たちに襲い掛かる。 <Veigue>たちに暴走を鎮められ、鎮魂錠を飲んだ<Eugene>は、ようやく冷静さを取り戻した。
Entry.EnglishText: However, <Eugene> was overwhelmed by his hatred towards the Huma and ran amok, attacking <Veigue> and the party. <Eugene> is finally able to regain himself once <Veigue> quells his outburst and has him drink the Requiem Pastille.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖なる戦い
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred War

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>異変の原因<White>が<Yellow>ゲオルギアス<White>ではないかと考えた<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>メセチナ洞窟<White>に手がかりを求める。
Entry.EnglishText: Surmising that the cause of these anomolies lies in <Yellow>Mesechina Cavern<White>, <Veigue> and the party search the area for clues.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、洞窟の奥に<Red>遺跡<White>を発見する。 <Yellow>石碑<White>には、<Red>聖なる戦い<White>と呼ばれる古の争いを伝える碑文が刻まれていた。 <Cyan>「<Red>思念<Cyan>が世界に散り、人々を憎しみ合わせている。聖者の力で思念を消せば争いを止められる」<White>と、<Veigue>たちは考える。
Entry.EnglishText: The party discovered some <Red>ruins<White> at the back of the cavern. Inscribed on the <Yellow>steles<White> was a record of an ancient conflict known as the <Red>Sacred War<White>. <Cyan>The <Red>Will<White> was scattered all around the world, inciting hatred among mankind<White>. <Veigue> and the party conclude that the <Cyan>Power of the Saints could erode the Will<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 石碑に描かれた<Red>紋章のような印<White>を見た、という<Hilda>の言葉をたよりに、<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>ラジルダ<White>へ向かい、 手がかりを探す事になる。
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda> recognizes the <Red>crest<White> on the stele, which leads <Veigue> and the party to head to <Yellow>Razilda<White> to search for clues on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの旗の下に
Entry.EnglishText: The Flag of Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ラジルダ<White>の街をめぐり、<Yellow>石碑の紋章<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party travel to the city of <Yellow>Razilda<White>, looking for the crest that was inscribed on the <Yellow>stele<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>ラジルダの旗<White>と<Yellow>紋章<White>の関連性に着目した六人は、さらに調査を続ける。
Entry.EnglishText: Noticing the connection between <Red>Razildan Flag<White> and the <Yellow>crest<White>, the six continue to investigate.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、紋章が<Blue>闇の力<White>と呼ばれる<Yellow>古代の聖者の力<White>を表している事がわかる。 カギを握るのは<Red>旗<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: They came to understand that the crest represented the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>, which was <Yellow>one of the powers of the ancient saints<White>. The key was held within the <Red>two<White> flags.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if I correctly translated this one

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>闇の力<Yellow>が眠るという泉<White>、泉の場所を示す地図、泉を開くというカギ、<Yellow>ふたつ<White>の種族に伝わる<Yellow>ふたつ<White>の旗と紋章……
すべてが<Yellow>ひとつ<White>になった時、六人は、石碑の紋章を見つけ、<Blue>闇の力<Yellow>が眠るという泉<White>の手がかりを得る。
四季の花が咲く不思議な泉のほとりで、<Cyan>ラジルダに伝わる古の詩<White>を歌った時、<Veigue>たちの目の前に、<Red>古代の遺跡<White>が姿を現した……
鏡の国の<Tytree>
<Yellow>泉の底から現れた遺跡<White>へと乗り込んだ<Veigue>たち。 力を求める<Tytree>に、<Blue>闇の力<White>の主は、信じるものを示せと言う。
<Tytree>は、目の前で繰り広げられる事件に激しく心を揺さぶれながらも、<Red>ひとつの答<White>にたどり着く。 ひとりとして自分と同じヒトはいない。 ヒトの数だけ種族があるようなものだ。 でも、ヒトがヒトとして感じる<Yellow>気持ち<White>は、みんな<Cyan>同じ<White>はずだ……と。
<Tytree>は<Blue>闇の力<White>、すなわち<Red>聖獣イーフォン<White>との戦いに打ち勝つ事で決意を示し、<Blue>闇の力<White>を手に入れる。
<Veigue>たちは<Blue>思念<White>の<Blue>浄化<White>のため、次なる<Yellow>聖獣<White>を求め、<Red>ピピスタ<White>へ向かう。
ピピスタの灯
Entry.EnglishText: Lights of Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: 次なる<Yellow>聖獣<White>を求めて、ピピスタに来た<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party have come to Pipista in search of the next <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこは、<Yellow>ガジュマの村<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: It was located in a <Yellow>Gajuma village<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックが捕らえられた一件を通じて、<Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>が眠るという<Blue>聖壇<White>の存在を、<Veigue>たちは知る。 ハックを助け、<Yellow>聖獣<White>を見つけるために<Blue>聖なる鳥<White>を復活させなくてはならない。
Entry.EnglishText: Hearing about the incident that led to Hack's imprisonment, <Veigue> and the party learn of the existance of the <Blue>Sacred Altar<White>, where the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White> is said to dwell. They must save Hack and revive the <Blue>Sacred Bird<White> in order to locate the <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>聖壇<White>に<Red>赤き命の珠<White>を捧げ、燃やせば、<Blue>聖なる鳥<White>がよみがえるという。 <Veigue>たちは<Red>捧げ物<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that if the <Red>Jewel of Life<White> is offered on the <Blue>altar<White> and burned, the <Blue>Sacred Bird<White> will be revived. <Veigue> and the others look for the <Red>offering<White>.
Entry.Notes: The first two characters of 赤き命の珠 means red - they learn that it needs to glow red. However, since the synopsis already says that it needs to be burned, I didn't include it since literally it would mean Red Jewel of Life, which is never stated in the story.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>聖壇<White>に<Red>アカトゲサボテン<White>が燃える時、<Yellow>聖なる鳥の図<White>、すなわち<Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>の<Yellow>地上絵<White>と同じものが浮かび上がる。
Entry.EnglishText: When a <Red>red-thorned cacti<White> is burned on the <Blue>altar<White>, an <Yellow>image of the Sacred Bird<White> emerges, matching the image that is displayed on the <Yellow>geoglyphs<White> in the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White>.
Entry.Notes: I thought the ostrich egg caused this?

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックを救った<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>へと向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: After freeing Hack from prison, <Veigue> and the party head to the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 熱砂に舞う翼
Entry.EnglishText: Wings Flying Over Hot Sand

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>に広がる、<Yellow>巨大な地上絵<White>。 そこには、<Yellow>古代の聖火台<White>があった。
Entry.EnglishText: A massive geoglyph stretches across the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White>. There they find a <Yellow>Flame Holder<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタの<Blue>聖壇<White>にあった言葉…… <Cyan>「強き心に強き翼を持て」<White>をたよりに、 <Yellow>聖火台<White>に<Red>火<White>を灯していく<Mao>。
<Cyan>心<White>と<Cyan>翼<White>に紅の炎が燃える時、<Blue>聖なる鳥<White>は羽ばたき、<Yellow>陽炎の荒野<White>に<Red>巨大な塔<White>が姿を現した。 七人は<Yellow>聖獣の待つ塔<White>へ向かう。
<Mao>の思い出
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>'s Memories

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ツルベナ荒野<White>にそびえる<Red>焔の塔<White>に来た<Veigue>たちに、<Blue>謎の声<White>が呼びかける。 <Yellow>声の主<White>は試練の始まりを告げた。
Entry.EnglishText: A <Blue>mysterious<White> voice calls out to <Veigue> and the party, who have come to the <Red>Tower of Inferno<White> that emerged from the grounds of the <Yellow>Crvena Wasteland<White>. The voice announces the beginning of the trial.

Entry.JapaneseText: 知恵の迷宮を進む<Mao>は、不思議な光景を見る。
Entry.EnglishText: As <Mao> traverses the Labyrinth of Wisdom, he sees a strange vision.

Entry.JapaneseText: それは、<Red><Mao>の記憶<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: It is <Red><Mao>'s memories<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: やがて<Mao>は知る。 己が何者なのかを……
Entry.EnglishText: At the end of his memories, <Mao> finds out who he truly is...

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分が<Yellow>聖獣<White>たちによって生み出された、特別な存在である事を。 出生の秘密にとまどいながらも、<Blue>思念浄化<White>への決意を示した<Mao>に、<Red>聖獣フェニア<White>は<Red>炎の力<White>を与える。 <Veigue>たちは次なる<Yellow>聖獣<White>を求め、<Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: He realizes he is a special being created by the <Yellow>Sacred Beasts<White>. Although puzzled upon learning the secret behind his birth, <Mao> remains determined to <Blue>purify the Will<White>, so the <Red>Sacred Beast Fenia<White> grants him the <Red>Power of Flame<White>. <Veigue> and the party seek out the next <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>, and sets out for the <Cyan>ancient tower which soars above the sea of clouds<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖なるもの、忌むべきもの
Entry.EnglishText: Is it Sacred or Abhorent?

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックから<Blue>古の塔<White>の事を聞くために、<Yellow>ピピスタ<White>に戻る<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party return to <Yellow>Pipista<White> to inquire about the <Blue>ancient tower<White> from Hack.

Entry.JapaneseText: その頃、ラジルダ近くの<Yellow>アズーラ海岸<White>に、女王アガーテが流れ着いていた…… 七人は<Yellow>ラジルダ<White>にハックを追う。
Entry.EnglishText: Meanwhile, Queen Agarte washes up on the <Yellow>Azure Coast<White> near Razilda... The party of seven follow Hack to <Yellow>Razilda<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ラジルダ<White>では、ガジュマの住民たちは、<Blue>闇の力<White>を調べようとしたハックを捕らえようとしていた。 七人はハック救出に向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: However, the Gajuma in <Yellow>Razilda<White> were trying to capture Hack, who had been trying to investigate the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>. The seven head out to rescue Hack.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>イーフォンの聖殿<White>でハックを救出した<Veigue>たちは、街へ戻る。
Entry.EnglishText: After rescuing Hack at the <Yellow>Shrine of Eephon<White>, <Veigue> and the party return to the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街では種族間の対立が激化していた。 そこへ、<Red>ミルハウスト<White>率いるカレギア軍が現れ、争いを鎮圧する。
Entry.EnglishText: The conflicts between the two races started to intensify in the city, but then the Callegean Army led by <Red>Milhaust<White> stepped in and quelled the conflict.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、ハックから<Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>と思わしき<Blue>幻の庭<White>の情報を得て、<Yellow>キョグエン<White>に向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party head for <Yellow>Kyogen<White> after receiving information from Hack on the <Blue>Garden of Illusions<White>, which may be a <Cyan>tower that soars over the sea of clouds<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 壁の向こうに
Entry.EnglishText: Beyond the Wall

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>キョグエン<White>で<Blue>古の塔<White>の手がかりを探す<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party look for clues on the <Blue>ancient tower<White> in <Yellow>Kyogen<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: フランツから、街の富豪<Red>ワン・ギン<White>が情報を持っていると聞き、会いに行く。
Entry.EnglishText: Upon reuniting with Frantz, they learn from him that <Red>Wang Gin<White>, a wealthy man in town, may have information on the matter, so the party decide to visit him.

Entry.JapaneseText: 情報の代わりに、<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>オークション<White>の警備をする事になる。
Entry.EnglishText: In exchange for the information, <Veigue> and the party agree to guard the <Yellow>auction<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 接客のため<Veigue>と引き離されたクレアは、監禁されてしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: Claire is separated from <Veigue> to serve as a hostess and is locked up.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこで、クレアとアガーテは互いの正体を知る事なく、壁越しに励まし合う。
Entry.EnglishText: During this time, Claire and Agarte speak to each other through the walls without realizing the other's identity, encouraging each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな折、<Yellow>オークション会場<White>が盗賊に襲われる。
Entry.EnglishText: Suddenly, the <Yellow>auction site<White> is attacked by bandits.

Entry.JapaneseText: 六人は、さらわれたクレアを追う。
Entry.EnglishText: The party of six pursue Claire, who had been kidnapped.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアを助けた<Veigue>たちは、<Blue>古の塔<White>の手がかりが<Yellow>ノルゼン<White>にあると聞き、<Red>北<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: After rescuing Claire, <Veigue> and the party hear that the clue to the <Blue>ancient tower<White> is in <Yellow>Nolzen<White>, and they decide to head <Red>North<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔
Entry.EnglishText: Tower of Nereg

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ノルゼン<White>で<Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>を探す。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party continue their search for the <Cyan>tower that soars over the sea of clouds<White> in <Yellow>Nolzen<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街の若者から<Yellow>ネジャナ半島<White>に<Red>ネレグの塔<White>があると聞かされる。
Entry.EnglishText: In town they learn from a man that there is a tower called the <Red>Tower of Nereg<White> that lies on the <Yellow>Nejana Peninsula<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ネレグの塔<White>に入った<Veigue>たちは<Blue>謎の声<White>に導かれ、<Yellow>最上階<White>を目指す。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue> and the party enter the <Yellow>Tower of Nereg<White>, where they are guided by a <Blue>mysterious voice<White> who leads them to the <Yellow>top floor<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 塔を守る三つの番人との戦いに勝利し、屋上へと駆け上がる<Veigue>たち。
Entry.EnglishText: After triumphing over the three guardians of the tower, <Veigue> and the party head to top.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、最上階で七人を待っていたのは、<Yellow>聖獣<White>ではなく、サレだった。 サレは催眠で<Blue>漆黒の翼<White>を凶暴化させ、<Veigue>たちを襲わせる。 元に戻った<Blue>漆黒の翼<White>は心を入れ替え、人のために戦う事を誓い、去って行く。 その時、<Veigue>たちの遥か前方に<Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>が姿を現した。
Entry.EnglishText: However, what awaited them at the top was not the <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>, but Saleh. He controls the <Blue>Dark Wings<White> and sends them berserk, having them attack <Veigue> and the party. After returning them to normal, the <Blue>Dark Wings<White> have a change of heart, choosing to fight for others instead, and leave. At that moment, the <Cyan>tower that soars over the sea of clouds<White> appears before them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 命の色
Entry.EnglishText: The Color of Life

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>古の塔<White>がある<Yellow>ベオ平原<White>に行くため、 <Veigue>たちは<Yellow>ノルゼン<White>で船を探す事になる。
Entry.EnglishText: To reach the <Yellow>Bayo Plains<White> where the <Blue>ancient tower<White> is located, <Veigue> and the party seek a ship in <Yellow>Nolzen<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、港は閉鎖され、船は出ない。
Entry.EnglishText: Unfortunately, the port is closed and there are no available ships.

Entry.JapaneseText: 七人は、軍の要請で<White>ノルゼン<White>に来ていた<Red>女医・キュリア<White>に相談する。
Entry.EnglishText: The party of seven consult with <Red>Doctor<White> Curia, who had come to <Yellow>Nolzen<White> at the request of the military.

Entry.JapaneseText: その矢先にバイラスが街を襲い、多くの兵士が傷つき、街は野戦病院と化す。
Entry.EnglishText: It is at this moment that a horde of Biruses attack the city, wounding several soldiers. The city is abruptly transformed into a field hospital.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、<Annie>はガジュマの兵士の治療を拒絶し、その兵士は絶命する。 兵士の命、涙する<Eugene>の姿に、<Annie>は<Cyan>「命に色はない」<White>という言葉の意味を知る。
Entry.EnglishText: However, <Annie> refuses to treat the Gajuma soldier, and he ends up perishing. With the loss of the soldier's life and <Eugene>'s tears, <Annie> finally understands the meaning behind the words "<Cyan>Life knows no color<White>."

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>は、仲間の助けを得て、兵士たちの治療にあたる。
Entry.EnglishText: With the support of her friends, <Annie> is able to treat injured soldiers.

Entry.JapaneseText: ようやく船を得た<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ベオ平原<White>にそびえる<Blue>古の塔<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: Having finally obtained a ship, <Veigue> and the party head for the <Blue>Ancient Tower<White>, which lies in the <Yellow>Bayo Plains<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>の真実
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>'s Truth

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>古の塔<White>で<Veigue>たちを待っていたのは、<Red>聖獣ウォンティガ<White>だった。
Entry.EnglishText: Awaiting <Veigue> and the party in the <Blue>Ancient Tower<White> is the <Red>Sacred Beast Wontiga<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>ドクター・バース殺害事件<White>の光景を 見せられた<Annie>の心は揺れる。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>'s heart is shaken when she is shown the truth of <Cyan>Dr. Barr's murder<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 父バースが犯した国王暗殺の大罪、<Eugene>がバースを殺した現実、バースをかばうために、すべてを失った<Eugene>の苦しみ…… つらく重い事実を突きつけられながらも<Annie>は種族の共存を強く願い、ウォンティガから<Blue>風の力<White>を授かる。 その時、<Red>聖獣シャオルーン<White>が割り込み、<Veigue>に呼びかける。 <Cyan>「急がないと大切なものを失う」<White> というシャオルーンの言葉を受け、 七人は<Yellow>ベルサス<White>へ向かう。
Entry.EnglishText: How Dr. Barrs committed regicide by assassinating the king, the reality that <Eugene> truly killed Barrs, and how <Eugene> sacrificed everyting to protect Barr's reputation. Although <Annie> is confronted with this painful truth, she confirms her desire for the coexistance of the two races and receives the <Blue>Power of Wind<White> from Wontiga. Suddenly, <Red>the Sacred Beast Shaorune<White> interjects and warns <Veigue> with these foreboding words: "You'll lose something precious to you!" Heeding Shaorune's warning, the seven head to <Yellow>Belsas<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスの日
<Yellow>ベルサス<White>に着いた<Veigue>たちは、<Cyan>「大切なもの」<White>が何なのかを探る。
一方、アガーテは<Yellow>ベルサス<White>がヒューマによるガジュマ差別がはびこる街だと知る。
アガーテはガジュマの窮状を救うべく、街の権力者<Red>スカラベ<White>との交渉に向かう。
ガジュマの反抗に怒ったスカラベは、<Cyan>アガーテの処刑<White>を行おうとする。 処刑台のアガーテは人々に訴える。 <Cyan>「心に種族はない」<White>と…… クレアとアガーテの<Yellow>入れ替わり<White>に気づいた<Veigue>は<Red>クレア<White>を救う。 だが、<Red>アガーテ<White>は逃亡する。
クレアを元に戻せないまま、七人は シャオルーンの待つ<Yellow>バビログラード<White>へ向かう。
聖獣シャオルーン！
<Yellow>シャオルーン<White>を探す<Veigue>たち。
<Blue>蒼の聖殿<White>の地下遺跡に入った<Veigue>に、シャオルーンは<Red>三つの試練<White>を課すと告げた。 <Red>第一の試練<White>は、<Cyan>シャオルーンのもとへ行く事<White>だった。
シャオルーンの見せる幻影を振り切り、最深部にたどり着いた<Veigue>は、 <Red>第二の試練<White>……<Cyan>聖獣との戦い<White>に挑む。
<Red>最後の試練<White>……<Cyan>シャオルーンの質問<White>に答えた<Veigue>は<Blue>水の力<White>を得る。 シャオルーンは<Veigue>たちと共に行くと言い残し、大空へはばたく。
<Veigue>たちは次の<Yellow>聖獣<White>の言葉を受け、<Hilda>の出自を探るため、<Yellow>ハーフの村<White>の手がかりを求め、<Yellow>東大陸<White>に<Yellow>フランツ<White>を探す。
愛する者へ
<Hilda>と同じ<Yellow>タロット<White>を持つという<Red>占い師<White>に会うため、<Yellow>モクラド村<White>に向かう<Veigue>たち。
占い師<Red>ナイラ<White>は<Hilda>の母だった。 だがナイラは<Hilda>を拒絶する。
なんとかナイラと話をしようとする<Veigue>たち。
そこにトーマが現れ、襲いかかる。 ナイラは<Hilda>をかばって、命を落とす……
自らの死を予期し、ナイラが残した <Yellow>手紙<White>に、両親の大きな愛を感じ、<Hilda>は涙する。
<Yellow>ナイラの遺品<White>から見つかった<Purple>紫水晶<White>を手がかりに、<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>アルヴァン山脈近くの島<White>を目指す。
<Hilda>が生まれた日
<Red>ギリオーヌ<White>の<Yellow>試練<White>に挑む<Hilda>。
<Yellow>聖獣<White>は<Hilda>に過去を見せる。 <Hilda>が生まれた日の両親の喜び。 ハーフとして差別を受けた心の傷。
父<Red>アムジル<White>の死、ナイラとの別れ。 悲しき初恋の終わり…… 改めて、<Yellow>ハーフ<White>である我が身を思い知らされた<Hilda>の心は揺れる。

<Yellow>純粋なヒトの身体<White>を与えるという<Yellow>聖獣<White>に、<Hilda>はひとりの<Yellow>ヒト<White>として両親に与えられたこの身体こそが、自分の<Red>誇り<White>なのだと告げる。 自らの存在を受け入れ、心を解放した時、<Hilda>は<Purple>光の力<White>を得る。 そして、<Veigue>たちは最後の<Red>聖獣ランドグリーズ<White>を求め、旅立つ。
幻を求めて
<Yellow>聖獣<White>ランドグリーズの手がかりとなる<Blue>幻の島<White>を探し、<Veigue>たちは世界を駆けめぐる。
<Yellow>ベルサス<White>の若者<Red>マウロ<White>の話から、<Red>伝説の海賊アイフリード<White>の宝と<Blue>幻の島<White>に関係があると考えた<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>バルカ島<White>の<Yellow>北の海<White>で宝を探す。
海賊の宝箱から出て来た<Purple>古い地図<White>に、違和感を感じる<Hilda>。 地図を調べると、<Cyan>サニイタウンが描かれていない<White>事がわかる。 <Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>に<Blue>幻の島<White>の手がかりを求め、向かう。
<Eugene>の絆
<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>が<Blue>幻の島<White>だと知った<Veigue>たちは、<Yellow>ランドグリーズの聖殿<White>へと導かれる。
<Blue>幻の島<White>はランドグリーズそのもので、<Yellow>サニイタウン<White>は<Cyan>ランドグリーズの背中の上にできた街<White>だと、<Yellow>聖獣<White>は語る。 そして、<Yellow>聖獣<White>は<Eugene>に試練を課す。
己の心に潜む光と影に直面させられても、揺るがない決意を示した<Eugene>に、ランドグリーズは<Blue>地の力<White>を与える。 ついにすべての<Red>聖獣の力<White>が集まった。
浄化
<Veigue>たちは<Yellow>聖獣の力<White>で、<Yellow>思念<White>を<Yellow>浄化<White>する。 人々に取りついていた<Yellow>思念<White>は消える。 使命を終えた<Yellow>聖獣<White>たちは去って行く。
<Mao>は、ようやく自分の正体を仲間たちに告げ、迷う心を伝える。 <Cyan>「おまえはおまえだ」<White>という<Veigue>の言葉に<Mao>は救われる。 その時、街で争いが起こった。
そこへシャオルーンが戻って来て、各地で争いが起こり始めていると告げる。
